萩生田氏の更迭求める野党…首相「撤回し謝罪している、今後も職責を」

06 Nov 2019, 13:25



衆院予算委員会で答弁する安倍首相（６日午後、国会で）＝米山要撮影

　衆院予算委員会は６日、安倍首相と関係閣僚らが出席して集中審議を行った。首相は、菅原一秀・前経済産業相と河井克行・前法相の辞任について、「就任からわずか１か月あまりで相次いで辞任する事態となったことは、国民に大変申し訳なく、任命した者として責任を痛感している」と陳謝した。
　野党側は首相の任命責任を何度もただしたが、首相は「国政に遅滞を生じることのないよう行政を前に進めていくことに全力を尽くすことで、国民に対する責任を果たしていく」との答弁を繰り返した。
　また、野党側は、政府が１日に決定した大学入学共通テストへの英語民間試験の導入見送り問題についても追及した。萩生田文部科学相は「経済的な状況や居住地域にかかわらず、等しく安心して試験を受けられるような配慮が十分なものになっていないなど、受験生にお勧めできるシステムになっていなかった」と釈明、今後１年をメドに試験のあり方を見直すとして理解を求めた。英語民間試験の活用を決めた経緯を検証するため、関連会議の議事録を公開する考えも示した。
　さらに、野党側は、英語民間試験を巡り、「自分の身の丈に合わせて勝負してもらえれば」と発言した萩生田氏の更迭を求めたが、首相は「撤回の上、謝罪している。今後もしっかりと職責を果たしてもらいたい」と応じなかった。

Opposition party seeking renewal of Mr. Ikuta ... Prime Minister "I have withdrawn and apologized, I will continue to take responsibility"

06 Nov 2019, 13:25



Prime Minister Abe answering at the House of Representatives Budget Committee (on the afternoon of the 6th, at the Diet) = Kaname Yoneyama

The House of Representatives Budget Committee attended an intensive discussion on the 6th with Prime Minister Abe and related ministers attending. The Prime Minister said about the resignation of Kazuhide Sugawara, former Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry, and Katsuyuki Kawai, former Minister of Justice. "I have a strong sense of responsibility."
The opposition party has repeatedly held responsibility for the appointment of the prime minister, but the prime minister said, “I will fulfill my responsibility to the people by doing everything I can to move the government forward so that there will be no delay in national politics.” The answer was repeated.
In addition, the opposition party also pursued the issue of postponing the introduction of the English private examination to the university entrance examination that the government decided on the 1st. “It was not a system that could be recommended to students, as the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology did not have enough considerations to allow them to take the exams equally, regardless of the economic situation or the residential area.” Interpretation, asking for understanding in the next year to review the ideal way of the examination. In order to verify the process of deciding to use the English private exam, the idea of releasing the minutes of related meetings was also shown.
In addition, the opposition party asked for the renewal of Mr. Ikuta, who said, “I hope he can compete with his height,” over the English private examination, but the prime minister “apologizes for the withdrawal. I want you to fulfill your responsibilities well. "
